abilities.name: The Stars Are Right
abilities.rule: Once per battle, at the start of the Fight phase, this model can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, triple the Attacks and Strength characteristics of this model’s Staff of Tomorrow and every successful Wound roll made for this model’s attacks scores a Critical Wound.

abilities.name: Master Chronomancer
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.

unit_composition:

**This model is equipped with:** Staff of Tomorrow.
